item.description:
Started: 06/24/2025 11:36 PDT
Ended: 06/24/2025 16:00 PDT
Some users may have experienced an issue with this service.
Some users were affected
Affected Services: Apple Business Essentials, Apple Business Manager, Photos, iCloud Account & Sign In, iCloud Calendar, iCloud Contacts, iCloud Mail, iCloud Storage Upgrades, iCloud Web Apps (iCloud.com), iWork for iCloud
